hero.title: Build Your Dream Store

globalSuppliers.description: Connect with verified suppliers worldwide and import products directly to your store.

marketAnalysis.title: Market Analysis
marketAnalysis.description: Get real-time insights and discover trending products in your niche.

productResearch.title: Product Research

orderManagement.title: Order Management

footer.description: AI-powered e-commerce optimization platform helping businesses scale globally.
